00049 template<unsigned DIM>
00050 class NagaiHondaForce  : public AbstractForce<DIM>
00051 {
00052 friend class TestForces;
00053 
00054 private:
00055 
00059     double mNagaiHondaDeformationEnergyParameter;
00060 
00064     double mNagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter;
00065 
00069     double mNagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00070 
00074     double mNagaiHondaCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00075 
00079     double mMatureCellTargetArea;
00080 
00081     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00082     template<class Archive>
00083     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00084     {
00085         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractForce<DIM> >(*this);
00086         archive & mNagaiHondaDeformationEnergyParameter;
00087         archive & mNagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter;
00088         archive & mNagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00089         archive & mNagaiHondaCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter;
00090         archive & mMatureCellTargetArea;
00091     }
00092 
00093 public:
00094 
00098     NagaiHondaForce();
00099 
00103     ~NagaiHondaForce();
00104 
00114     void AddForceContribution(std::vector<c_vector<double, DIM> >& rForces, AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00115 
00125     virtual double GetAdhesionParameter(Node<DIM>* pNodeA, Node<DIM>* pNodeB, VertexBasedCellPopulation<DIM>& rVertexCellPopulation);
00126 
00130     double GetNagaiHondaDeformationEnergyParameter();
00131 
00135     double GetNagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter();
00136 
00140     double GetNagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter();
00141

00153 
00159     void SetNagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter(double nagaiHondaMembraneSurfaceEnergyParameter);
00160 
00166     void SetNagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyParameter(double nagaiHondaCellCellAdhesionEnergyEnergyParameter);
00167 
00173     void SetNagaiHondaCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter(double nagaiHondaCellBoundaryAdhesionEnergyParameter);
00174 
00184     double GetTargetAreaOfCell(const CellPtr pCell) const;
00185

00190
